survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Digital Wellbeing Initiatives Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on digital wellbeing initiatives implemented in the workplace to ensure healthy technology usage and work-life balance.

questions.question_text: How often do you feel overwhelmed by digital notifications and communications at work?
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced scale to capture frequency accurately. Ensure mobile-friendly display for ease of response.

script.question_text: How often do you feel overwhelmed by digital notifications and communications at work?

questions.question_text: Which digital wellbeing tools or initiatives have you used in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Mindfulness or meditation apps provided by the company
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to understand adoption rates of various initiatives.

script.question_text: Which digital wellbeing tools or initiatives have you used in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Mindfulness or meditation apps provided by the company

questions.question_text: How effective do you find the current digital wellbeing initiatives in helping you manage stress and maintain work-life balance?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure effectiveness perceptions clearly.

script.question_text: How effective do you find the current digital wellbeing initiatives in helping you manage stress and maintain work-life balance?

questions.question_text: What additional digital wellbeing initiatives would you like to see implemented in the workplace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture diverse suggestions. Keep text box size reasonable for mobile users.

script.question_text: What additional digital wellbeing initiatives would you like to see implemented in the workplace?

questions.question_text: Has participation in digital wellbeing initiatives positively impacted your overall job satisfaction?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents except those who selected 'None of the above' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Routing logic ensures relevance. Use clear options to differentiate impact levels.
